disclaimer.text: The creator of $t(common.app_title) takes no responsibility for any inaccuracies in the information on the site, as this is purely a hobby project at this point. No personal data is collected by this site, but youtube videos showed on the festival pages might collect cookies.
disclaimer.title: Disclaimer

features.artists: Artist pages to see which festivals each artist is attending
features.festivals: Festival pages with current and previous lineups
features.matching: Festival matching with more than 1000 festivals worldwide
features.title: $t(common.app_title) features

support.share: Spread the word! Share your matching results and tell everyone about $t(common.app_title)
support.title: Ways to support

tech_stack.backend_code: Backend written in Python with Django and SQLite as database
tech_stack.backend_container: Backend server environment contained with Docker
tech_stack.backend_host: Backend hosted on DigitalOcean running Ubuntu 24.04
tech_stack.backend_server: Django server set up with Gunicorn and Nginx
tech_stack.festival_info: Lineup and festival information from Music Festival Wizard
tech_stack.frontend_code: Frontend made with React, Typescript, React Query and Zustand
tech_stack.frontend_ui: Components and styling with Shadcn (Radix UI) and Tailwind CSS
tech_stack.music_info: Playlists and artists from Spotify using OAuth 2.0 authorization
tech_stack.title: Technology stack

profile_popover.log_in: <Link>Log in</Link> to match your Spotify profile with music festivals!

artist_page.no_festivals: This artist has no registered festivals in our database.

cookies.youtube: YouTube videos on $t(common.app_title) might use cookies

error.generic_error: Oops, something went wrong. Please refresh the page to try again
error.invalid_share_url: The url is incorrect or something else funky happened here. Double check the url and try again.

footer.line_1: Find music festivals with your playlists
footer.line_2: A festival finder created by <Link href="https://github.com/OskarAsplin">Oskar Asplin</Link>

algorithm.description: The matching algorithm is a combination of artist and genre matching. The number of artists in your selected playlist attending a festival combined with how well the genres of the playlist fit the festival, determines the match score shown on each festival.
algorithm.title: Matching algorithm

criteria_select.label: Match with
criteria_select.click_link: Can't change matching source on this page. Click the link above or the Spotifest logo on top to change it.

modal.title: Letâ€™s find your perfect festival!
modal.no_top_artists_or_playlists: We can't find any listening habits or playlists to use for our festival matching. Go to your <Link>Spotify profile</Link> and create or subscribe to a playlist to start your festival matching

matching.no_results: No registered festivals in the selected area in this time frame.

shared_results_page.test_yourself: Test with your own playlists <Link to="/">here!</Link>

social_media_buttons.tooltip: Share the match results for this playlist!
social_media_buttons.tooltip_disabled:
Only playlist results can be shared.
Select a playlist as matching shource.
social_media_buttons.message_my_playlist: I matched my Spotify playlist "{{playlist_name}}" with music festivals using Spotifest. Check out the results!
social_media_buttons.message_other_playlist: I matched the Spotify playlist "{{playlist_name}}" with music festivals using Spotifest. Check out the results!
